name: 邱泰元
objective:
本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、長句型、用字與閱讀技巧，分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領，並介紹 AI 在英語文學習的輔助使用。 (9/13 第一堂課導論 進行程度分組 請修課同學務必到班)
Objective of this course is to improve science paper reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces English technical article writing skills by way of imitating reading contents that are frequently used. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained. A brief introduction of how AI could help English learners will be introduced.
